borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Erection of a rear roof extension; erection of rear extensions at basement, ground and second floor levels; formation of a rear roof terrace at third floor level; installation of a new door opening in the front roofslope and formation of a roof terrace at third floor level to the front elevation; installation of new rooflights in the front roofslope; installation of 8no solar panels above the roof of second floor rear back addition; installation of new windows to replace the existing windows to the rear and side elevations; installation of new doors to replace the existing windows at mezzanine floor level to the rear elevation; installation of a window to replace the existing door at first floor level to side elevation; removal of external staircase from the side of the building; formation of new rear lightwell openings at basement level; alterations to the shopfront to include the installation of new residential entrance door and new glazing to replace the existing; change of use of part of the basement and ground floor level from retail (Class E) into residential (Class C3), and change of use of the upper floor levels from HMO (Sui Generis) into residential (Class C3) in connection with the conversion of the mezzanine, first, second, third, part of basement and ground floor levels into 4 x 1 bedroom and 4 x 2 bedroom self-contained flats' to allow amendments to the description and remove 'formation of a rear roof terrace at third floor level; installation of a new door opening in the front roofslope and formation of a roof terrace at third floor level to the front elevation' replacing it with 'formation of roof terraces and retention of door opening in the front roofslope' and changing the housing units mix from 4 x 1-bedroom and 4 x 2-bedroom self-contained flats to 3 x 1-bedroom and 5 x 2-bedroom self-contained flats' (no drawings to be substituted).
